0.2.1.en: Fixed bug with wrong object in Flow cards

0.4.5.en: Now works with devices configured fore Home Assistant. Fixed onoff capability behaviour

0.4.8.en: Sending Power0 command replaced by separate commands per socket

0.6.0.en: Added support for white temperature and light color control

0.6.1.en: Fixed bug with wrong device tile state

0.6.2.en: Fixed bug with multiple triggers when switch device from web

0.7.0.en: Added support for devices with fan (Sonoff iFan02 and iFan03). Added new icons based on device type (only for newly added devices)
